Course Description: Studying Theories propounded by Masters of Theatre and their lives and influences. The course is designed not only to give a theoretical appreciation of theatre but it will be largely interspersed with class room improvisations and voice and movement exercises so that the students have a hands-on understanding right from the start

Course Outcomes.CO1: Student have Knowledge of Biographies and Techniques proposed by Theatre Masters.
Course Outcomes.CO2: Students have ability to Overcome inhibitions in communication.
Course Outcomes.CO3: Students have ability to put up a mime show
Course Outcomes.CO4: Students have ability to put up a mime show
